mapper.select: SELECT poster_idx as posterIdx , pfm_idx as pfmIdx , origin_name as originName , stored_name as storedName , create_date as createDate FROM poster_info WHERE pfm_idx IN ( SELECT pfm_idx as pfmIdx FROM performance WHERE pfm_idx=#{pfmIdx} )

SELECT pfm_idx as pfmIdx , hall_idx as hallIdx , name , genre_idx as genreIdx , pfm_start as pfmStart , pfm_end as pfmEnd , age_grade_idx as ageGradeIdx , running_time as runningTime FROM performance WHERE pfm_idx=#{pfmIdx}
SELECT a.artist_idx , name , img_uri FROM ( SELECT artist_idx FROM cast WHERE pfm_idx=#{pfmIdx} ) c LEFT JOIN artist a ON c.artist_idx = a.artist_idx

SELECT e.* FROM( SELECT exp_idx as expIdx , pfm_idx as pfmIdx , user_idx as userIdx , exp_content as expContent , create_date as createDate FROM expectation WHERE pfm_idx=#{pfmIdx} ORDER BY create_date DESC ) e LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON u.user_idx = e.userIdx

SELECT u.profile , u.name , u.email FROM( SELECT exp_idx as expIdx , pfm_idx as pfmIdx , user_idx as userIdx , exp_content as expContent , create_date as createDate FROM expectation WHERE pfm_idx=#{pfmIdx} ORDER BY create_date DESC ) e LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON u.user_idx = e.userIdx
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expectation(exp_idx, pfm_idx, user_idx, exp_content) VALUES (expectation_seq.nextval, #{pfmIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{expContent})
